overview: Hungry For Love is the story of one young man's emotional battle about coming out, experiencing sex for the first time and the nearly hopeless task of trying to find true love at an early age. Everyone that Dino Vista encounters is only interested in sexual gratification and never interested in anything more. Dino is obsessed with finding one true love that he can share more than his perfect body with. Is this possible in today's fast-paced world where everybody seems only into the "moment?"
title: Hungry for Love
